name: ManageAzureVMExtension
friendlyName: Manage VM extensions in Azure PIR
description: Manage VM extensions in Azure Platform Image Repository
author: Microsoft Corporation

options.CreateOrUpdate: Create or Update extension in Azure PIR
options.Promote: Promote extension in the specified regions in Azure PIR

inputs.name: StorageAccountName
inputs.label: Storage Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a storage account. If the account does not exixt, it will be created.

inputs.name: ContainerName
inputs.label: Container Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Container. If the container does not exixt, it will be created.

inputs.name: StorageBlobName
inputs.label: Storage Blob Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Storage Blob to upload. If this field is left blank, a unique name will be autogenerated everytime the release executes.

inputs.name: PrependVersionFromManifestToBlobName
inputs.label: Prepend Version From Manifest To Blob name
inputs.helpMarkDown: On selecting this checkbox, the extension version in the manifest file will be prepended to the storage blob name.

inputs.name: ExtensionPackage
inputs.label: Extension package file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The package file for the extension to be created/updated.

inputs.name: ExtensionDefinitionFile
inputs.label: Extension Definition File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the extension definition file.

inputs.name: NewVersion
inputs.label: New Extension Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the variable which will contain the new/updated extension version.

inputs.name: FullExtensionName
inputs.label: Full Extension Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Complete Name of the extension(including publisher name) to delete. For eg. if the publisher name is A.B.C, and the extension name is D, then this field should be A.B.C.D

inputs.name: Version
inputs.label: Extension Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the extension to delete.

inputs.name: Regions
inputs.label: Regions to Promote to
inputs.helpMarkDown: Give a list of regions separated by semicolons to promote the extension to. Give an empty string if promoting to all regions.
